======================
Tutorials
======================

1. This `first tutorial`_ displays transmorph's basic features, and shows
   how tuning the weighting strategy can deal with the issue of dataset
   unbalance.

2. This `second tutorial`_ goes deeper in integration parameters.

3. This `third tutorial`_ shows transmorph's capabilities in dealing with
   large, high dimensional single cell datasets.

.. _first tutorial: tutorial/simple_example.ipynb
.. _second tutorial: tutorial/tutorial_methods.ipynb
.. _third tutorial: tutorial/lung_dataset.ipynb
